name: qwen-image-editing-server
description: AI Image Editing Server using Qwen-Image model for text-to-image generation and image editing
readme:
# Qwen-Image AI Editing Server

Advanced AI image generation and editing server using Qwen-Image 20B model.

## Features
- Text-to-image generation
- Image editing with prompts
- High-resolution output (up to 2048x2048)
- Multi-language support
- Fast processing with GPU acceleration

## Usage

### Text-to-Image Generation
```python
input = {
  "task": "generate",
  "prompt": "A beautiful landscape with mountains",
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 1024,
  "num_inference_steps": 50,
  "guidance_scale": 4.0
}
```

### Image Editing
```python
input = {
  "task": "edit",
  "image": "<base64_encoded_image>",
  "prompt": "Change the sky to sunset colors",
  "strength": 0.8,
  "num_inference_steps": 50
}
```

### Health Check
```python
input = {
  "task": "health"
}
```
